definition: board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: The Adagio section ends in a relatively subdued and bright mood.
sentences.chinese: 慢板於此處帶著節制的開朗情緒中暫時告一段落。

sentences.english: Jimmy: And that is how we slow jam the news.
sentences.chinese: 吉米“這就是這一期的慢板新聞。

sentences.english: How to dance a adagio combination in ballet in this free dancing video.
sentences.chinese: 如何在這個自由舞的視頻在芭蕾舞蹈組合慢板。

sentences.english: I'm thinking of Tania and how she claws away at her adagio.
sentences.chinese: 我在想塔尼亞，想她怎樣彈奏慢板。

sentences.english: "Educating tomorrow's transport managers" is the adagio of the DMS course.
sentences.chinese: “教育明天的運輸管理人員”是DMS的過程中慢板。

definition: to fall apart/opera section in free rhythm
sonata form (one of the large-scale structures used in Western classical music)
